name: Artemis Consulting, Inc.
description:
A professional services company based in the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area.
Artemis Consulting, Inc. provides management consulting and information technology solutions to the private and government sectors.
Our IT support services include Virtualization Planning and Implementation, Cloud Computing, Systems Administration on Windows, Linux and other Unix variants, Microsoft Exchange Administration and Architecture and Microsoft Active Directory Planning, Setup and Administration.
